title: italic sans serif ID please
content:
Can't figure out the font for the word JETTERS and the web address. I know NORTHWEST is eurostyle.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [jetters\_font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725054039/http:/typophile.com/files/jetters_font.jpg) | 115.18 KB |
author: chili

comments.content: I'd probably go with [Impact](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725054039/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Impact), manually slanted and /J bottom terminal extended.

"JETTERS" looks like a manually slanted **[Impact](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725054039/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=MS-Windows-Fonts&ffam=Impact%20-%20Regular&fid=9f55a26d868843e465aeeb10dd59d64c&fstyle=i&fsize=60&text=JETTERS&fit=1)** + a modified /J

The web address looks like a manually slanted **[Myriad Pro (Semibold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725054039/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=Myriad%20Pro%20-%20Semibold&fid=563c0ad883002b3846b8d08f745c17cc&fstyle=i&fsize=60&text=www.jettersnorthwest.com&fit=1)**  
(if you use the real italic version you'll get a different /e)
thanks. I think this is right.
